title: Firefox for Android 46.0beta Beta

notes.note:
Notifications about [tabs opened in the background][1] now list the URLs


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/open-links-background-later-viewing-firefox-android

[Firefox will request permissions][1] at runtime instead of installation time (Android 6.0+)


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/how-firefox-android-use-permissions-it-requests
Previously cached pages will be displayed when offline
History and Bookmarks items added to menu
Top Sites panel now lists popular sites by default

[Removed support][1] for Firefox Sync 1.1 in favor of Firefox Accounts 


  [1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/services/2015/07/31/shutting-down-the-legacy-sync-service/

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 2.3
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
